aboutMe.name: About me
description: I am Ignas Kurkulis ‚Äì a motivated and curious individual, building my experience across various fields ‚Äì from volunteering for youth communities and serving in the military to business management, aviation company operations, and most importantly, programming.

During my school years, I was actively involved in the youth organization ‚ÄûApskritasis stalas‚Äú, where I coordinated camps, helped organize city festivals, planned youth activities, and hosted various events.

After graduating from high school, I completed a 9-month voluntary military service in the Lithuanian Armed Forces, at the Duke Vaidotas Infantry Battalion. During my service, I was promoted in military rank for performing my duties effectively and responsibly.

Upon completing the mentioned voluntary service, I enrolled at Vilnius University Business School. I chose to study International Business, during which I completed an internship at the Human Resources Department of ‚ÄúHeston Airlines‚Äù. Additionally, while studying, I worked as a Crew Coordinator in the aviation industry for 3 years, where I gained valuable experience. The most important takeaway was getting to know the internal operational processes of the aviation sector.

After graduating, I started actively exploring the IT field and chose to focus on Full-Stack development. Currently, I am studying in the JavaScript Full-Stack long-term program at Vilnius Coding School. This training is a great introduction to the programming industry, and my next step is to deepen my knowledge, continue learning, and challenge myself in personal IT projects.

I am eager and aim to sharpen my skills in a dynamic and challenging environment. I guarantee enthusiasm in my work and relentless effort in delivering projects, ensuring my full commitment to every task while continuously growing as a professional.

education.description: I completed a Bachelor's degree in International Business, where I gained a solid foundation in business management, marketing, finance, and international market analysis. The program emphasized project-based learning and problem-solving approaches.

I completed Full-Stack Web Development course, where I gained practical skills in building web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js and more. I am proficient in developing and integrating front-end and back-end components, managing APIs, working with databases, and deploying projects to servers.

description.name: Tasks and Responsibilities
description.descInfo: Coordinated and monitored flight crew schedules up to 72 hours in advance, ensuring compliance with legal rest and duty time regulations. Operatively adjusted crew rosters in response to flight delays, crew sickness, or other operational changes, maintaining smooth flight operations.

description.name: Skills and Knowledge Gained
description.descInfo: Developed strong problem-solving and decision-making skills under time pressure while working in a high-paced aviation environment. Gained in-depth knowledge of crew management systems and international aviation regulations, improving operational planning and communication abilities.

description.name: Tasks and Responsibilities
description.descInfo: Ensuring a high level of customer experience in restaurant and bar areas by creating a pleasant and welcoming atmosphere. Efficient order management and workflow organization to ensure smooth service and adherence to quality standards.

description.name: Skills and Knowledge Gained
description.descInfo: Learned to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment while maintaining a high standard of customer service and professional communication. Strengthened teamwork, conflict resolution, and situational management skills.

otherJobs: ‚ÄúConsilia‚Äù ‚Äì Assistant Worker for the Event Technical Team. Assembly and disassembly of event infrastructure (stage, lighting, sound equipment). Collaboration with the technical team to ensure events are prepared on time and run smoothly.

‚ÄúS&J Projektai‚Äù ‚Äì Construction and Carpentry Worker. Participation in various construction projects, performing carpentry tasks, and building frameworks. Practical experience working with construction and woodworking tools and materials, ensuring compliance with occupational safety standards.

‚ÄúUtenos Mƒósa‚Äù ‚Äì Warehouse Worker. Product labeling tasks on the production line, applying labels and stickers to packaging. Ensured operational efficiency, precision, and strict adherence to hygiene and quality standards in the food production process.
